myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>autoRelease</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Automatic Release</myLabel> <myToolTip>Queue automatically releases waiting entities based on the release period. Otherwise another object must trigger the release.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>releasePeriod</myVariableName> <myType>double</myType> <myLabel>Release Period (s)</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>500</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
